comments.raw_text:
This bug was filed from the Socorro interface and is 
report bp-23243485-90a8-4cd8-9579-d4f402110706 .
============================================================= 

I was doing some exploratory testing on Mac OS X 10.7 GM, using the icanhazcheezburger page, when the application crashed. I just remember scrolling down when this happened, and I haven't been able to reproduce yet.
comments.author: jbecerra@mozilla.com

comments.raw_text: This is the only report we have this stack so far, so not terribly widespread.
comments.creator: mozillamarcia.knous@gmail.com
comments.text: This is the only report we have this stack so far, so not terribly widespread.
comments.author: mozillamarcia.knous@gmail.com

comments.raw_text: This still gets reported at really low volume with 1 report in the last week, 3 in the last month, and 25 in the last year.
comments.text: This still gets reported at really low volume with 1 report in the last week, 3 in the last month, and 25 in the last year.

comments.raw_text: For what it's worth, we don't get reports on OS X anymore, only Windows and Linux so maybe this is a different issue.
